schedule: Buenos Aires – Mar del Plata – Bahía Blanca
circumstances: Shortly after a night takeoff from Mar del Plata-Brigadier General Bartolomé de la Colina Airport, while climbing, the pilot-in-command made a turn according to the procedures when control was lost. The airplane stalled and crashed into the sea some three km off shore. All ten occupants were killed.
probable_cause: The exact cause of the accident could not be determined with certainty. However, spatial disorientation on part of the pilot-in-command is suspected.
